thread.section_title: CardKangaroo.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CardKangaroo.com | cardkangaroo.com
thread.title: Gladys

author: Gladys
title: Gladys
text:
I must admit I was doubtful about selling my gift card here. I did it because they remit to PayPal. I mailed my card back with the envelope I printed online and followed the instructions. Within a week I got a quick response back via email that my card had decreased in value by $4.57. After checking the card balance online, CardKangaroo.com was correct. They told me how to follow up. I did and the money was deposited in my account
just like they advertise. I shall use their services again in the future. I did not have to wait weeks for my money.
